column18: 11/24/2017: Assailants threw a Molotov cocktail at the residence of Nicanor Garrida, a El Heraldo de Leon journalist, in Guanajuato, Mexico. There were no casualties in the attack. No group claimed responsibility for the incident.
column97: Molotov cocktails were used in the attack.
column108: A house was damaged in this attack.
column125: There is doubt that this incident meets terrorism-related criteria. Sources noted that the journalist had previously been attacked for taking pictures of a shooting victim. In addition, sources suspected that the attack may have been targeting the journalist's son, who distributed newspapers that highlighted the activities of a drug dealer.
column126: \\"\"Journalist from Guanajuato denounces attack with Molotov cocktails to his house and vehicle"
column129: 2017.\",\"\"\"Revision: Mexico Security Update: Human Heads Found Outside TV Station"
column132: 2017.\",\"\"\"Molotov bombs thrown at a journalist's truck in Guanajuato"

column18: 12/19/2017: Assailants opened fire on Gumaro Perez during a Christmas party at an elementary school in Acayucan, Veracruz, Mexico. Perez, a journalist, was killed in the attack. No group claimed responsibility for the incident.
column129: 2017.\",\"\"\"Killing of Mexico journalist draws int'l condemnation"
